info.title: Lexodus API
info.description: Federal Court Case Management System API

put.description: Directly set a user's court role. Requires admin or clerk in target court.

get.description:
List a user's court roles.
- Admin: returns all court roles.
- Clerk: returns only role for the header court (do not reveal other courts).

delete.description: Remove a court role from a user. Requires admin or clerk in target court.

get.description:
List pending court role requests.
- Admin: all pending requests.
- Clerk: only requests for courts they manage.

post.description:
Approve a pending court role request.
Requires admin or clerk in the request's court.

Deny a pending court role request.
Requires admin or clerk in the request's court.

get.summary:
GET /api/cases/{case_id}/assignment-history
Get the full assignment history for a case.

200.description: Deadlines filtered by case and type

get.description:
Returns a unified chronological timeline of all docket entries and document
events for a case, newest first.

get.summary: Returns the merged configuration for the court (base + overrides).
List configuration overrides scoped to a district.

parameters.name: scope_id
parameters.description: The scope_id (e.g. the district code or judge UUID string).

parameters.name: scope_id
parameters.description: The scope_id (e.g. the district code or judge UUID string).

parameters.name: scope_id
parameters.description: The scope_id (e.g. the district code or judge UUID string).

get.summary: List configuration overrides scoped to a judge.

parameters.name: scope_id
parameters.description: The scope_id (e.g. the district code or judge UUID string).

parameters.name: scope_id
parameters.description: The scope_id (e.g. the district code or judge UUID string).

parameters.name: scope_id
parameters.description: The scope_id (e.g. the district code or judge UUID string).

post.summary:
Preview a configuration with hypothetical overrides applied.
Returns the overrides merged with the request body.
Create a new conflict check record.

get.summary: List all conflict checks for a given attorney.

post.summary: Run a live conflict check against existing representations.

get.description:
Returns a list of common federal rules with their deadline calculations.
These are hardcoded reference data based on the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure.
Get a presigned download URL for an attachment.

Proxy download  streams the file bytes through the server with proper
Content-Type and Content-Disposition headers.  Works as a plain `<a href>`
on web, desktop, and mobile (no JS required).

post.description: Finalize an attachment upload by checking HEAD and marking uploaded_at.

get.description: List uploaded attachments for a docket entry.

post.description: Initiate a presigned upload for a new attachment.

parameters.name: finalize
parameters.description: If true, verify object and mark uploaded

post.description:
Link an existing document to a docket entry. Both the entry and document
must belong to the same court tenant.

Promote a docket attachment into a canonical document entry.
The attachment must belong to the tenant and must have been uploaded
(uploaded_at IS NOT NULL). If a document already exists for this
attachment, the existing document is returned (idempotent).

200.description: Document already exists for this attachment

400.description: Invalid request or attachment not uploaded

get.description: List audit events for a document. Requires clerk or judge role.

post.description:
Replace a document with a corrected version. The original is stricken.
Requires clerk role.
Seal a document. Requires clerk or judge role.
Strike a document from the record without replacement. Requires clerk role.
Unseal a document. Requires clerk or judge role.

Submit a unified docket event (text entry, filing, or promote attachment).
Role requirements vary by event kind.

patch.summary: Update a feature flag's enabled status.

get.summary: List all feature flags (implementation view). Same data, different context.

post.summary: Manage a feature flag (create or update).

Set a feature override scoped to a court or judge.
This stores the override in config_overrides with scope "feature".

delete.summary: Clear all feature overrides for the court.

get.summary: Check if a specific feature is enabled.

post.description:
Submit an electronic filing. Atomically creates a Document, DocketEntry,
and Filing record. Returns 400 with validation errors if invalid.

get.description: Return jurisdiction info for the requesting court.

post.description:
Initiate a staged file upload for a filing. Returns a presigned PUT URL.
Client uploads directly to S3/RustFS, then calls finalize.

Finalize a staged filing upload by verifying the object exists in S3
and marking it as uploaded.

Validate a filing request without submitting it.
Always returns 200  the response body indicates whether the filing is valid.

get.description: Retrieve the persisted Notice of Electronic Filing for a given filing.

get.summary:
GET /api/judges/available
List judges who have capacity (current_caseload < max_caseload) and are Active.

GET /api/judges/conflicts/check/{party_name}
Check if any judge has a conflict involving a specific party name.

GET /api/judges/district/{district}
List judges in a specific district.

GET /api/judges/vacation
List judges currently on vacation (status = "Inactive" with a courtroom note).

GET /api/judges/{id}/workload
Get workload summary for a judge.

get.description: Retrieve a NEF by its associated docket entry ID.
Retrieve a NEF by its primary ID.

get.summary:
GET /api/opinions/citations/statistics
Get citation statistics for a court.

GET /api/opinions/statistics
Calculate aggregate opinion statistics for a court.

post.summary:
POST /api/opinions/{opinion_id}/file
File an opinion (set status to "Filed" and record filed_at).

get.summary:
GET /api/opinions/{opinion_id}/is-binding
Check if an opinion is binding precedent (published + precedential).

GET /api/opinions/{opinion_id}/is-majority
Check if an opinion is a majority opinion.

post.summary:
POST /api/opinions/{opinion_id}/publish
Publish an opinion (set is_published = true and record published_at).

get.summary:
GET /api/orders/expiring
List orders expiring within N days (default 30).

post.summary:
POST /api/orders/from-template
Create a new order from a template by substituting variables.

get.summary:
GET /api/orders/pending-signatures
List orders awaiting signatures (status = "Pending Signature").

GET /api/orders/requires-attention
List orders in "Draft" or "Pending Signature" status.

GET /api/orders/statistics
Get aggregate order statistics for a court.

post.summary:
POST /api/orders/{order_id}/issue
Issue an order, updating status to "Filed".

POST /api/orders/{order_id}/service
Record that an order was served on parties.

POST /api/orders/{order_id}/sign
Sign an order, updating status to "Signed".
Generate a Conditions of Release document.
Generate a Conditions of Release document in a specified format.
Generate a Court Order in a specified format.
Generate a Criminal Judgment document in a specified format.
Generate a Minute Entry in a specified format.
Generate a Rule 16(b) Scheduling Order document.
Generate a Rule 16(b) Scheduling Order in a specified format.
Generate a signed Rule 16(b) Scheduling Order.
Generate a signed Rule 16(b) Scheduling Order in a specified format.
Generate a Waiver of Indictment document.
Generate a Waiver of Indictment in a specified format.

POST /api/recusals/{recusal_id}/process
Process a pending recusal (grant or deny).

Migrate representation from one attorney to another on a case.
This ends the old attorney's active representations and creates new ones
for the new attorney on the same parties.

get.summary: List all rules for the court.

post.summary:
Evaluate active rules against a provided context.
Returns all matching rules (whose conditions overlap with the context)
and the collected actions.

get.summary: List rules filtered by source/trigger type.

GET /api/sentencing/active-supervision
List sentencing records with active supervised release.

GET /api/sentencing/appeal-deadlines
List sentencing records where appeal deadline is approaching (14 days from judgment).

post.summary:
POST /api/sentencing/calculate-guidelines
Calculate sentencing guidelines range from inputs.

get.summary:
GET /api/sentencing/date-range
List sentencing records within a date range.

GET /api/sentencing/pending
List sentencing records that have no sentencing_date yet.

GET /api/sentencing/rdap-eligible
List all BOP designations where the defendant is RDAP-eligible.

GET /api/sentencing/statistics/departures
Get departure statistics for a court.

GET /api/sentencing/statistics/district
Get sentencing statistics for the entire court district.

GET /api/sentencing/statistics/judge/{judge_id}
Get sentencing statistics for a specific judge.

GET /api/sentencing/statistics/trial-penalty
Get trial penalty statistics (comparing plea vs trial sentences).

GET /api/sentencing/statistics/variances
Get variance statistics for a court.

GET /api/sentencing/substantial-assistance
List sentencing records with downward departures (substantial assistance).

GET /api/sentencing/upcoming
List sentencing records with upcoming sentencing dates (in the next 30 days).

post.summary:
POST /api/sentencing/{id}/bop-designation
Add a BOP designation to a sentencing record.

POST /api/sentencing/{id}/calculate-offense-level
Calculate the total offense level from a base level and adjustments.

get.summary:
GET /api/sentencing/{id}/criminal-history-points
Calculate criminal-history points from prior sentences.

post.summary:
POST /api/sentencing/{id}/departure
Record a departure on a sentencing record.

POST /api/sentencing/{id}/lookup-guidelines-range
Look up sentencing guidelines range from offense level and history category.

POST /api/sentencing/{id}/prior-sentences
Add a prior sentence to a sentencing record.

get.summary:
GET /api/sentencing/{id}/safety-valve-eligible
Check if a defendant qualifies for the safety-valve provision.

post.summary:
POST /api/sentencing/{id}/special-conditions
Add a special condition to a sentencing record.

put.summary:
PUT /api/sentencing/{id}/supervised-release
Update supervised-release months on a sentencing record.

post.summary:
POST /api/sentencing/{id}/variance
Record a variance on a sentencing record.
Upload (create or update) a judge's electronic signature.

POST /api/templates/orders/{template_id}/generate
Generate content from a template by substituting variables.

get.summary: List to-do items for a specific user.
Get a single to-do item by ID.

post.summary: Toggle the completed status of a to-do item.

AddCaseEventRequest.description: Request to add a case event for timeline tracking.

AddPracticeAreaRequest.description: Request to add a practice area.

AppError.description: Structured application error used across server and client.

ApproveDeviceRequest.description: Request DTO for approving a device authorization (entered by user in browser).

AssignmentHistory.description: Assignment history for a judge  wraps a list of case assignments.

AttorneyAddToCaseRequest.description: Request to add an attorney to a case.

AttorneyCaseLoad.description: Case load breakdown for an attorney.

AttorneyResponse.description: API response shape for an attorney (nested address).

AuthResponse.description: Response returned after successful authentication (login or register).

AuthUser.description: Authenticated user info (safe to send to client).

court_roles.description: Per-court role memberships: maps court_id -> role string.

AvailableSlot.description: An available scheduling slot for a judge.

BarAdmissionResponse.description: API response shape for a bar admission.

BatchPdfItem.description: A single item in a batch PDF generation request.

BatchPdfRequest.description: Request body for batch PDF generation.

BopDesignationResponse.description: API response for a BOP designation.

BulkCreateServiceRecordRequest.description: Request body for bulk-creating service records for a document.

CalculateDeadlineRequest.description: Request to calculate a deadline from a rule code.

CalendarEntryResponse.description: API response for a calendar entry (matches OpenAPI CalendarEntry schema).

CalendarEventType.description: Calendar event type values matching the DB CHECK constraint.

CalendarSearchResponse.description: Search response for calendar entries (matches OpenAPI CalendarSearchResponse).

CanPracticeResult.description: Result of checking if an attorney can practice in a given court.

CaseAssignmentResponse.description: API response shape for a case assignment.

CaseNoteResponse.description: API response for a case note.

CaseResponse.description: API response shape for a criminal case.

CaseStatistics.description: Aggregate statistics for cases in a court district.

ChargeResponse.description: API response shape for a criminal charge.

CheckoutRequest.description: Request DTO for creating a Stripe checkout session.

CheckoutResponse.description: Response containing the Stripe checkout session URL.

CitationStatistics.description: Citation statistics for opinions in a court.

CjaAppointmentResponse.description: API response shape for a CJA appointment.

ConfigOverrideResponse.description: API response for a configuration override.

ConfigPreviewRequest.description: Request body for previewing a configuration with overrides applied.

ConflictCheckRequest.description: Request to run a conflict check for an attorney.

ConflictCheckResponse.description: API response for a conflict check.

CourtRoleRequestResponse.description: A pending or resolved court role request.

CourtUtilization.description: Court utilization metrics for a time range.

CreateAttachmentRequest.description: Request body for initiating a docket attachment upload.

CreateAttachmentResponse.description: Response returned when a presigned upload is initiated.

CreateAttorneyRequest.description: Request to create a new attorney.

CreateBarAdmissionRequest.description: Request to create a new bar admission.

CreateBopDesignationRequest.description: Request to create a new BOP designation.

CreateCaseAssignmentRequest.description: Request to create a new case assignment.

CreateCaseNoteRequest.description: Request to create a new case note.

CreateCaseRequest.description: Request to create a new criminal case.

CreateChargeRequest.description: Request to create a new charge against a defendant.

CreateCjaAppointmentRequest.description: Request to create a new CJA appointment.

CreateConflictCheckRequest.description: Request body for creating a conflict check record.

CreateCustodyTransferRequest.description: Request to create a new custody transfer record.

CreateDeadlineRequest.description: Request to create a new deadline.

CreateDefendantRequest.description: Request to create a new defendant in a case.

CreateDisciplineRecordRequest.description: Request to create a new discipline record.

CreateDocketEntryRequest.description: Request to create a new docket entry.

CreateDraftCommentRequest.description: Request to create a new draft comment.

CreateEvidenceRequest.description: Request to create a new evidence item.

CreateExcludableDelayRequest.description: Request to create an excludable delay.

CreateExtensionRequest.description: Request to create a new extension request.

CreateFederalAdmissionRequest.description: Request to create a new federal admission.

CreateFromTemplateRequest.description: Request to create an order from a template.

CreateHeadnoteRequest.description: Request to create a new headnote.

CreateJudgeConflictRequest.description: Request to create a new judge conflict.

CreateJudgeRequest.description: Request to create a new judge.

CreateJudicialOpinionRequest.description: Request to create a new judicial opinion.

CreateJudicialOrderRequest.description: Request to create a new judicial order.

CreateMotionRequest.description: Request to create a new motion in a case.

CreateOpinionCitationRequest.description: Request to create a new opinion citation.

CreateOpinionDraftRequest.description: Request to create a new opinion draft.

CreateOpinionVoteRequest.description: Request to create a new opinion vote.

CreateOrderTemplateRequest.description: Request to create a new order template.

CreatePartyRequest.description: Request body for creating a new party.

CreatePriorSentenceRequest.description: Request to create a prior sentence record.

CreateProHacViceRequest.description: Request to create a new pro hac vice admission.

CreateProductRequest.description: Request DTO for creating a product.

CreateRecusalMotionRequest.description: Request to create a new recusal motion.

CreateRepresentationRequest.description: Request body for creating a representation.

CreateRuleRequest.description: Request body for creating a new rule.

CreateSentencingRequest.description: Request to create a new sentencing record.

CreateServiceRecordRequest.description: Request body for creating a new service record.

CreateSignatureRequest.description: Request body for creating or updating a judge signature.

CreateSpecialConditionRequest.description: Request to create a new special condition.

CreateTodoRequest.description: Request body for creating a new to-do item.

CreateUserRequest.description: Request DTO for creating a user.

CreateVictimRequest.description: Request to create a new victim record.

CustodyTransferResponse.description: API response shape for a custody transfer.

DeadlineResponse.description: API response shape for a deadline.

DefendantResponse.description: API response shape for a defendant.

DeviceAuthStatus.description: Status of a device authorization request.

DeviceFlowInitResponse.description: Response from initiating a device authorization flow.

DeviceFlowPollResponse.description: Response from polling a device authorization request.

DisciplineRecordResponse.description: API response shape for a discipline record.

DocketAttachmentResponse.description: API response shape for a docket attachment.

DocketEntryResponse.description: API response shape for a docket entry.

DocketSheet.description: A full docket sheet for a case.

DocketStatistics.description: Aggregate statistics for docket entries in a case.

Document.description: A document stored in the system (metadata only, no blob).

is_stricken.description: Whether this document has been stricken from the record.

replaced_by_document_id.description: If this document has been replaced, points to the replacement document.

seal_motion_id.description: Optional motion that authorized the sealing.

sealing_level.description: Granular sealing level (application-level policy beyond boolean is_sealed).

source_attachment_id.description: The docket attachment this document was promoted from, if any.

DocumentEventResponse.description: API response shape for a document event.

DocumentResponse.description: API response shape for a document.

DraftCommentResponse.description: API response shape for a draft comment.

EcfRegistrationResponse.description: API response shape for an ECF registration.

EndRepresentationRequest.description: Request body for ending a representation.

EvaluateRulesRequest.description: Request body for evaluating rules against a context.

EvaluateRulesResponse.description: Response body for a rule evaluation.

EventKind.description: The kind of docket event being composed.

EventStatus.description: Event status values matching the DB CHECK constraint.

ExcludableDelayResponse.description: API response for an excludable delay.

ExtensionResponse.description: API response shape for an extension request.

FeatureFlagResponse.description: API response for a feature flag.

FeatureStatusResponse.description: Response for a feature-enabled status check.

FederalAdmissionResponse.description: API response shape for a federal admission.

FederalRule.description: A federal rule entry for reference.

Filing.description: An electronic filing submitted to the court.

FilingResponse.description: Response from a successful filing submission.

FilingUpload.description: A staged upload for a filing (presign + finalize pattern, no docket entry needed).

FilingValidationError.description: A single validation error or warning for a filing.

FinalizeFilingUploadResponse.description: Response from finalizing a staged filing upload.

ForgotPasswordRequest.description: Request DTO for initiating a password reset email.

GenerateContentRequest.description: Request to generate order content from variables.

GoodStandingResult.description: Result of a good-standing check on an attorney.

HeadnoteResponse.description: API response shape for a headnote.

InitFilingUploadRequest.description: Request to initiate a staged filing upload.

InitFilingUploadResponse.description: Response from initiating a staged filing upload.

InitiateDeviceRequest.description: Request DTO for initiating a device authorization flow.

JudgeConflictResponse.description: API response shape for a judge conflict.

JudgeResponse.description: API response shape for a judge.

JudgeSignatureResponse.description: API response for a judge signature.

JudgeWorkload.description: Summary of a judge's current workload.

JudicialOpinionResponse.description: API response shape for a judicial opinion.

JudicialOrderResponse.description: API response shape for a judicial order.

LinkDocumentRequest.description: Request to link an existing document to a docket entry.

MigrateRepresentationRequest.description: Request body for migrating representation from one attorney to another.

MotionResponse.description: API response shape for a motion.

Nef.description: A persisted Notice of Electronic Filing.

NefResponse.description: API response shape for a NEF.

OffenseLevelRequest.description: Request to calculate total offense level.

OpinionCitationResponse.description: API response shape for an opinion citation.

OpinionDraftResponse.description: API response shape for an opinion draft.

OpinionStatistics.description: Aggregate statistics about opinions in a court.

OpinionVoteResponse.description: API response shape for an opinion vote.

OrderStatistics.description: Statistics about orders in a court.

OrderTemplateResponse.description: API response shape for an order template.

items.description: API response shape for an attorney (nested address).

Party.description: A party to a case (defendant, government, intervenor, etc.).

joined_date.description: When the party joined the case. Nullable in DB (defaults not set on all rows).

service_method.description:
ServiceMethod enum stored as text (e.g. "ECF", "Mail", "PersonalService").
Nullable in the DB  not all parties have a service method set.

PdfGenerateRequest.description: Generic request body for PDF generation endpoints.

PdfGenerateResponse.description: Response containing generated HTML (to be rendered as PDF by a downstream service).

PleaEntry.description: A single plea entry used in a batch plea request.

PleaRequest.description: Request to enter pleas for one or more charges.

PollDeviceRequest.description: Request DTO for polling a device authorization status.

PracticeAreaResponse.description: API response shape for a practice area.

PriorSentenceResponse.description: API response for a prior sentence.

ProHacViceResponse.description: API response shape for a pro hac vice admission.

Product.description: A product available in the catalog.

PromoteAttachmentRequest.description: Request to promote a docket attachment into a canonical document.

RecusalMotionResponse.description: API response shape for a recusal motion.

ReminderResponse.description: API response shape for a deadline reminder.

ReplaceDocumentRequest.description: Request to replace a document with a corrected version.

title.description: Optional new title. Falls back to the original document title.

upload_id.description: Staged upload ID of the replacement file.

Representation.description: An attorney's representation of a party in a case.

representation_type.description: RepresentationType enum stored as text (e.g. "Private", "Court Appointed", "Pro Bono").

withdrawal_reason.description: WithdrawalReason enum stored as text (when applicable).

ResetPasswordRequest.description: Request DTO for resetting a password with a token.

ReviewCourtRoleRequest.description: Request body for reviewing (approve/deny) a court role request.

RunConflictCheckRequest.description: Request body for running a live conflict check.

RunConflictCheckResult.description: Result of a live conflict check.

ScheduleEventRequest.description: Request to schedule a new court event (matches OpenAPI ScheduleEventRequest).

SealDocumentRequest.description: Request to seal a document. Requires clerk or judge role.

motion_id.description: Optional UUID of the motion that authorized the sealing.

SealingLevel.description:
Document sealing level  controls visibility beyond the boolean `is_sealed`.

- `Public`  visible to all with case access.
- `SealedCourtOnly`  only court staff (clerks + judges) can view.
- `SealedCaseParticipants`  court staff + case attorneys.
- `SealedAttorneysOnly`  only case attorneys (not public, not other staff).

SendPhoneVerificationRequest.description: Request DTO for sending a phone verification code.

SendReminderRequest.description: Request to send a deadline reminder.

SendVictimNotificationRequest.description: Request to send a victim notification.

SentencingResponse.description: API response shape for a sentencing record.

ServeOrderRequest.description: Request to serve an order on parties.

ServiceCheckResponse.description: Service check response for an entry type.

ServiceMethod.description: Valid service methods matching the DB CHECK constraint.

ServiceRecord.description: Record of service of process or documents on a party.

ServiceRecordResponse.description: API response for a service record.

SetConfigOverrideRequest.description: Request body for setting a configuration override.

SetCourtRoleRequest.description: Request body for directly setting a court role (admin or clerk).

SetFeatureOverrideRequest.description: Request body for setting a feature override scoped to a court or judge.

SpecialConditionResponse.description: API response for a sentencing special condition.

SpeedyTrialResponse.description: API response for a speedy trial clock.

StartSpeedyTrialRequest.description: Request to start the speedy trial clock for a case.

trial_start_deadline.description: If not provided, computed as 70 days from the earliest milestone.

SubmitEventRequest.description:
Request to submit a docket event through the unified composer.
Fields are optional because different event kinds use different subsets.

attachment_id.description: Docket attachment ID to promote. Required for PromoteAttachment.

description.description: Free-text description. Required for TextEntry, used as docket description for Filing.

entry_type.description: Docket entry type (e.g. "motion", "order"). Required for TextEntry.

filed_by.description: Who filed the document. Required for Filing.

upload_id.description: Staged upload ID (from the filing upload flow). Optional for Filing.

SubmitEventResponse.description: Response from submitting a docket event.

SubscriptionStatus.description: Current subscription status for a user.

SubstituteAttorneyRequest.description: Request body for substituting an attorney on a case.

TimelineEntry.description: A single entry in the unified case timeline.

id.description: Unique ID for this timeline entry (may be docket_entry.id or document_event.id).

TimelineResponse.description: Response for the unified timeline endpoint.

TodoResponse.description: API response for a to-do item.

UpdateAttorneyRequest.description: Request to update an existing attorney (all fields optional for partial update).

UpdateCaseNoteRequest.description: Request to update an existing case note.

UpdateCaseRequest.description: Request to update a criminal case (all fields optional  only provided fields are changed).

UpdateChargeRequest.description: Request to update a charge (all fields optional  only provided fields change).

UpdateDeadlineRequest.description: Request to update an existing deadline (partial update).

UpdateDefendantRequest.description: Request to update a defendant (all fields optional  only provided fields change).

UpdateEventStatusRequest.description: Request to update event status (matches OpenAPI UpdateEventStatusRequest).

UpdateEvidenceRequest.description: Request to update evidence (all fields optional  only provided fields change).

UpdateExtensionRulingRequest.description: Request to update the ruling on an extension.

UpdateFeatureFlagRequest.description: Request body for updating a feature flag.

UpdateJudgeRequest.description: Request to update a judge (all fields optional).

UpdateJudgeStatusRequest.description: Request to update only a judge's status.

UpdateJudicialOpinionRequest.description: Request to update a judicial opinion (all fields optional).

UpdateJudicialOrderRequest.description: Request to update a judicial order (all fields optional).

UpdateMotionRequest.description: Request to update a motion (all fields optional  only provided fields change).

UpdateOrderTemplateRequest.description: Request to update an order template (all fields optional).

UpdatePartyRequest.description: Request body for updating a party (all fields optional  read-modify-write pattern).

UpdatePartyStatusRequest.description: Request body for updating party status only.

UpdatePhvStatusRequest.description: Request to update the status of a pro hac vice admission.

UpdateProductRequest.description: Request DTO for updating a product.

UpdateProfileRequest.description: Request DTO for updating the current user's profile.

UpdateRecusalRulingRequest.description: Request to update a recusal ruling.

UpdateRuleRequest.description: Request body for updating a rule (all fields optional).

UpdateSentencingRequest.description: Request to update a sentencing record (all fields optional).

UpdateSpeedyTrialClockRequest.description: Request to update a speedy trial clock.

UpdateTierRequest.description: Request DTO for updating a user's subscription tier.

UpdateUserRequest.description: Request DTO for updating a user.

UpsertEcfRegistrationRequest.description: Request to create or update an ECF registration.

UserRole.description:
Court user role controlling access to filing operations.

- `Public`  unauthenticated or unknown role. View-only access to public records.
- `Attorney`  can file documents, view public + SealedAttorneysOnly.
- `Clerk`  can add docket entries, seal/unseal, strike/replace, promote.
- `Judge`  can issue orders, seal/unseal.
- `Admin`  full access (superset of all roles).

UserTier.description: User subscription tier controlling feature access.

ValidateFilingRequest.description: Request to validate a filing before submission.

sealing_level.description: Granular sealing level. Defaults to "Public" if omitted.

upload_id.description: Staged upload ID from POST /api/filings/upload/init + finalize flow.

VerifyPhoneRequest.description: Request DTO for verifying a phone number with a code.

VictimNotificationResponse.description: API response shape for a victim notification.

VictimResponse.description: API response shape for a victim.

tags.name: evidence
tags.description: Evidence and custody chain management endpoints

tags.name: speedy-trial
tags.description: Speedy Trial Act clock and delay management

tags.name: events
tags.description: Unified event composition and timeline endpoints
